StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.name: [GetWaiver]
StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.body:
( @WaiverID uniqueiden..er ) AS
SET TRANSACTION ISOLATION LEVEL READ UNCOMMITTED
SELECT w.WaiverID, w.LeadID, w.WaiverStatusID, w.WaiverCategoryID, w.WaiverTypeID, w.WaiverLevelID, w.ControlNumber, recr.WaiverReviewID as RecWaiverReviewId, recr.ReviewerID as RecReviewerId, recr.ReviewDate as RecReviewDate, recr.WaiverReviewAc.onID as RecAc.onId, rssr.WaiverReviewID as RssWaiverReviewId, rssr.ReviewerID as RssReviewerId, rssr.ReviewDate as RssReviewDate, rssr.WaiverReviewAc.onID as RssAc.onId, rsr.WaiverReviewID as RsWaiverReviewId, rsr.ReviewerID as RsReviewerId, rsr.ReviewDate as RsReviewDate, rsr.WaiverReviewAc.onID as RsAc.onId, rr.WaiverReviewID as RegionWaiverReviewId, rr.ReviewerID as RegionReviewerId, rr.ReviewDate as RegionReviewDate, rr.WaiverReviewAc.onID as RegionAc.onId, mcrcr.WaiverReviewID as McrcWaiverReviewId, mcrcr.ReviewerID as McrcReviewerId, mcrcr.ReviewDate as McrcReviewDate, mcrcr.WaiverReviewAc.onID as McrcAc.onId, w.TFRSNumber, w.RequestedBy_UserID FROM [dbo].[Waiver] w LEFT OUTER JOIN [WaiverReview] recr on recr.WaiverReviewId = w.RecruiterWaiverReviewID LEFT OUTER JOIN [WaiverReview] rssr on rssr.WaiverReviewId = w.RssWaiverReviewID LEFT OUTER JOIN [WaiverReview] rsr on rsr.WaiverReviewId = w.RsWaiverReviewID LEFT OUTER JOIN [WaiverReview] rr on rr.WaiverReviewId = w.RegionWaiverReviewID LEFT OUTER JOIN [WaiverReview] mcrcr on mcrcr.WaiverReviewId = w.McrcWaiverReviewID WHERE [WaiverID] = @WaiverID
